name: Murmentia
description:
Murmentia is a hybrid puzzle game meant to be played with an interactive seat - MurMur.

In Murmentia the player organizes pieces of Mur's memory and kill dementia bugs.

Murmentia was created in Train Jam 2016 with Construct 2 by Annakaisa Kultima (design, graphics), Timo Nummenmaa (programming, design, sound design) and Gustavo Samour (programming, design).

Thanks to Heikki Tyni for supina!
